text: Taking her shot. #ClarkCounty Commission Chairman @MKNVspeaks gets her second #COVID19 #Vaccine at Cashman Ctr. Along with the @SNHDinfo and @ClarkCountyFD, they are continuing to encourage people to get #vaccinated . Make appointments at https://t.co/Z8jTkBmDsR. #Vegas https://t.co/lCvKkjhNCq
